resources.string: When the "Game" button is pressed, you will see a layout of grey boxes.
In the top right, you will see the number of Poke Balls you want to find.
In the top left, you will see the number of "performed" scans.
To scan for Poke Balls, click on a blank rectangle.
When clicked, the square will either reveal a Poke Ball, or a number.
This number reveals how many Poke Balls are within the same row or same column as the "scanned" place.
Use these numbers strategically to find all your hidden Poke Balls in the least scans possible!
